name: Galio

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Colossal Smash
passive.description: Innate: Every few seconds,  Galio's next  basic attack is modified to gain  attack speed and deal magic damage in an area, increased based on his  bonus magic resist.
passive.description_source:
Colossal Smash deals  basic damage to the primary target but also triggers spell effects by also being tagged as  spell damage, while dealing  proc damage also tagged as  area of effect to secondary targets.
 Spellblade does not get converted to magic damage and it will deal its damage only to the primary target.
Colossal Smash applies  on-hit effects to its primary target twice.(bug)
The empowered attack will not trigger against  wards and plants.
Galio gains attack speed even on non-empowered attacks as long as the ability is not on cooldown.
PENDING FOR TEST: Does Colossal Smash trigger against allies?
Even if the ability hit is  spell shielded Colossal Smash's cooldown will still be reduced.

basic_ability_1.name: Winds of War
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Galio fires two windblasts that converge to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
Deals  area damage on the gust and applies  persistent area damage for the tornado.
 Spell shield will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
 Yasuo's  Wind Wall and  Braum's  Unbreakable can block each windblast individually.
The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.

basic_ability_2.name: Shield of Durand
basic_ability_2.description:
The static movement speed modifier overrides the target's base movement speed value to the modified amount, and their bonus movement speed value to 0.
The modifier is not applied if the target is  slow-immune.
Galio may still buffer his actions during the recast lockout.
The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except  Winds of War.

basic_ability_3.name: Justice Punch
basic_ability_3.description:
Galio will initiate the  dash even if his step backwards is  knocked down.
Galio's second dash will always dash the distance of the target direction. Having the step backwards cut short has no effect on the total distance gained.

ultimate.name: Hero's Entrance
ultimate.description:
Hero's Entrance does not resist allied  crowd control.
Hero's Entrance has a  forgiveness radius of 175 units.
Galio cannot cast Hero's Entrance on allies he cannot  see while  nearsighted.
Galio will still cause an impact to occur at the destination even if he is unable to travel the full distance with the dash (e.g. by  The Hextech Ultimatum's and  Realm of Death's borders and terrain). Galio will dash as far as he can go, and thus, does not end the dash prematurely.
Galio will always dash 100 units minimum, and dash over his target's location if they are less than 100 units away from him.
The following table refers for interactions while Galio is  channeling:
